forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a refreshing coolness, inviting a pause in the bustling rhythm of the city. The sky stretches in deepening shades of blue, remnants of the day fading gently into night. Current conditions reflect a clear canvas, with no fog to obscure the view and a light west-southwest breeze weaving through the streets. Anticipate a restful night ahead, with temperatures settling comfortably around 59.

Tomorrow heralds another day of clear skies, promising warmth with highs reaching near 68. A lively wind will accompany the sunshine, offering refreshment but suggesting a light layer for those sensitive to the chill along the bay. Whether it's wandering through Golden Gate Park or opting for a leisurely café visit downtown, the day holds the potential for simple joys. Comfort and practicality will guide your attire—think breathable fabrics and perhaps a light jacket for the evening strolls when the warmth gently fades. In this vibrant corner of the world, each moment is an invitation to savor life’s subtle pleasures.
